name: COPS Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to create the stripped-down vessels favored by the COPS.

name: COPS Navy Package
desc: A collection of blueprints used to create ships employed often by COPS in their navy.

name: COPS Auxiliary Package
desc: A collection of blueprints used to create ships employed often by COPS as a means to supplement their fleets with utility.

name: COPS Cruiser Package
desc: A collection of blueprints used to create several cruisers utilized by COPS.

name: COPS Arsenal Ship Package
desc: A collection of blueprints used to create ships employed often by COPS which feature a heavy focus on missile weaponry.

name: COPS Black Ops Package
desc: A collection of blueprints used to create the extremely rare Black Ops variants of several COPS ships.
